name: THE UNSAVED (Demo)
description:
THE UNSAVED (Demo)

Donate to support Dev......

The Unsaved is a game about the journey of a man who is possessed by some devilish side of his own. Explore the magical world and find a way to free him from his devilish side.

The Story: In this game, you play as Aurelio who sets out in the search of the essential elements to achieve salvation from his devilish side, but some actions from his past hinders him from doing so.

Game Features :

♦ Explore a magical world full of surprises.

♦ Magical combats to defeat your enemies, and a Store to upgrade your powers.

♦ Traps to be avoided with timing.

♦ Puzzles to solve wisely.

♦ Many power-ups, such as you can slow down time.

♦ Portals to teleport from one place to another.

Note: This is just a prototype for playtesting and to get support. Original content may be enhanced from this.

Since the game is in development, your support and feedback will be of great importance to me so actively participate in the development of the game.

Advice, tell me about bugs and glitches etc.

Thank you very much to all my supporters, please Follow, Share and Like .....

Thanks for coming to this game. This game is a #platformer game that is full of surprises and it will test your platforming skills badly.

If you've read this much, then you surely value your time and my efforts. Give it a try for sure.

♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥
